factions.name: 7 Wonders
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Use the special resource symbols on your minions and modifiers to increase the power of your cards' abilities.

factions.name: 1960s Batman
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Holy Shufflebuilding, Batman! These characters have jumped straight out of the 1960s action TV show to save the city of Gotham! If you're in a pinch, make sure to use your handy Bat-Utility Belt!

factions.name: Aboleths
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Suppress other players' actions and store them in your genetic memory to use later.

factions.name: Ace Attorneys
factions.author: SirErrant
factions.description: Bluff your way to victory by summoning witnesses from the discard pile and forcing opponents to Present their cards as evidence.

factions.name: Adventurers
factions.author: Just Lazer DGE
factions.description: Strengthen Rookies.

factions.name: AIR
factions.author: phantomic109
factions.description: Place counters on your minions at the start of the turn before cashing them in to score bases.

factions.name: Aiur Protoss
factions.author: SDNuKe
factions.description: Hit opposing minions with controlled power debuffs and strike at the opportune moment with multiple breakpoint reduction effects.

factions.name: Alchemists
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Empty out your deck to unlock a huge power spike, but have difficulty breaking bases before then.

factions.name: Amnesia
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Seed the fear and the madness in your opponents, take control of the board if they hide for too long.

factions.name: Ancient Aztecs
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Offer your prisoners to the Aztec gods to ask for their blessings.

factions.name: Ancient Romans
factions.author: phantomic109
factions.description: Retrigger the on-play abilities of your low-power minions.

factions.name: Angels
factions.author: Sonus
factions.description: Give yourself permanent buffs that can benefit you each turn.  Use different Laws to control what players are allowed to do. All 5-power minions.

factions.name: Animal Crossing
factions.author: bae_gel
factions.description: Play base modifiers that react to playing a character there and go back to your deck once they're out of uses.

factions.name: Archaeologists
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Grow your civilization's legacy, then unearth it in the future.

factions.name: Astronomers
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Order your deck to repeatedly reveal specific cards.

factions.name: Avatar the Last Wind Worker
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Bend the Elements to your advantage, sneak attack unsuspecting bases, and gain benefits from self-destruction.

factions.name: Babies
factions.author: Bandit
factions.description: Grow stronger over time and utilize start of turn effects.

factions.name: Bad Boys
factions.author: Colinus Haggardus
factions.description: Radically bend the rules to hinder your opponents and boost yourself.

factions.name: Barbarians
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Swarm bases and gain benefits through destruction.

factions.name: Bards
factions.author: ludichrisness, normieleon
factions.description: Unlock your partner's true potential with the power of motivational song and an eclectic mix of actions.

factions.name: Baristas
factions.author: inushiba
factions.description: Gain access to cards at any time by milling them into your discard pile, then brewing them later with the proper ingredients.

factions.name: Batman
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Gain benefits by capturing opposing minions and returning them to the hand.

factions.name: Blacksmiths
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Burn through your deck quickly and scale to the size of your discard pile.

factions.name: Blood Realm
factions.author: Sonus
factions.description: Exsanguinate +1 power counters from your own cards to accomplish powerful, blood-fueled effects.

factions.name: Body Snatchers
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Switch hands and decks with other players and gain the advantage by buffing minions you do not own.

factions.name: Boos
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Have your minions pop in and out mysteriously through the mechanic of burying.

factions.name: Bounty Hunters
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Place bounties on other players' minions and remove them from the board to collect your reward.

factions.name: Boxers
factions.author: Captain Cardboard
factions.description: Carefully time and string together a flurry of action plays to boost your power and overwhelm your opponents.

factions.name: Breakfast Cereal Mascots
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Stage minions and actions one turn and trigger powerful abilities at the start of your following turn.

factions.name: Brewers
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Return cards in your hand, deck, and discard pile to the box for benefits and to thin your deck.

factions.name: Brink of the Future
factions.author: Colinus Haggardus
factions.description: Harness the power of time itself to thwart your enemies' plans and seal every chance you have for victory.

factions.name: Bureaucrats
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Control your opponent by creating stipulations that you benefit from.

factions.name: Butlers
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Serve your partner faction by giving it anything that it might need. Reap benefits from storing cards.

factions.name: Calaveras (formerly Skeletons)
factions.author: Awesom360
factions.description: Get extra draw and plays via cards that activate exclusively from the discard pile before returning to your deck.

factions.name: Caper Crew
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Steal other players' cards and use them as resources to carry out a variety of plans with a team of six 5-power minions.

factions.name: Card Slingers
factions.author: Sonus
factions.description: Revealing cards from your hand and top of deck for benefits (draw/extra plays, etc). Compare your hands/cards with opponents for benefits.

factions.name: Catastrophes
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Replace bases with Catastrophes and gain benefits by power boosts and other benefits that are activated when a base is replaced.

factions.name: Cave Men
factions.author: Crossfire7
factions.description: Play actions on bases, then destroy them to play extra minions and power up your minions.

factions.name: Centaurs (Munchkin)
factions.author: GammaMania
factions.description: Play hybrid actions called Steeds, which can be played on either a minion or base and have different effects for each. Move your cards.

factions.name: Centurions
factions.author: Bandit
factions.description: Smash additional decks together and utilize your partner faction to your full potential.

factions.name: Chaos Gods
factions.author: Ludum
factions.description: Switch between your 4 titans at the right time to spread chaos across the board.

factions.name: Chess
factions.author: Grey Sherpa
factions.description: Utilize a unique minion structure to perform heavy hitting minion combos directly out of your deck.

factions.name: Chimeras
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Create Chimeras with powerful abilities by destroying their ingredients to make powerful minions with powerful effects.

factions.name: Chrono Drifters
factions.author: Lime17
factions.description: Control the board with base modifiers and delay other players' threatening cards by putting them in stasis...all while managing a dangerous titan that any player could play, but nobody wants to!

factions.name: Chuck Norris (formerly Action Heroes)
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Go for the Ultimate Win by spelling Chuck Norris's name or blast bases with letters of his name and powerful action heroes.

factions.name: Circus Performers
factions.author: ludichrisness, Snakevin
factions.description: Play with a troupe of smaller units who boost each other up to activate their abilities together.

factions.name: Clone Army
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Overwhelm opponents with powerful weaponry and destructive capabilities manned by multiple unique minions, most of whom share a common name.

factions.name: Clue
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Engage all players in a murder mystery guessing game, using your cards to give yourself an advantage.

factions.name: Colosseum of Fools
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Maintain the highest total power in play and corral opponents to where you want them.

factions.name: Colour Out Of Space, The
factions.author: Snakevin, ludichrisness
factions.description: Play with ten identical minions who bottom-deck themselves to play actions off the top. Spend Madness for powerful effects before banishing it back to whence it came.

factions.name: Comedians
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Play pranks on other players by increasing their power but taking it away when it counts.  Use your minions to power up bases other than their own.

factions.name: Conquerors
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Get first place on bases quickly to generate momentum, converge minions during destruction, and gain benefits from having the upper hand.

factions.name: Cooking Mama
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Race against time to complete recipes and wow the family! Use the new Mission cards to spice up your game and serve up some victory!

factions.name: Cosmoballers
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Transfer actions that grant talents between your minions for access to card draw, recursion, and extra plays.

factions.name: Coven
factions.author: Grey Sherpa
factions.description: Master your discard pile with powerful actions and recovery.

factions.name: Cribbage
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Make carefully calculated plays and be rewarded with VP for successfully achieving goals.

factions.name: C.R.O.W.S.
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: This faction of crows rally against words using that fifth symbol as a crutch.

factions.name: Dark Souls
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Hunt down four powerful Souls to upgrade your deck and link the fire.

factions.name: Dante's Inferno
factions.author: Sasha
factions.description: Hinder your opponents' strategies by gifting them cards with self-harming effects and gain advantage during their downfall or when they use/discard the given cards.

factions.name: Diabolists
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Your minions come into play shackled, limiting their full potential. Break their bindings to unleash their power.

factions.name: Diamond is Unbreakable
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Play actions on anyone's minions and control the flow of the board based on who they're attached to.

factions.name: Djinni
factions.author: Awesom360
factions.description: Play Wishes on minions which have powerful and versatile abilities that can also backfire... badly.

factions.name: Doctor Who
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Choose one of the many incarnations of The Doctor, each with their own gameplan and cards, to combine with a set of 10 shared cards.

factions.name: Double Agents
factions.author: Onassi, Nietzschean
factions.description: Shuffle your cards into other players' decks to thin yours and dilute their draw; reveal your cards from their hand or deck to sabotage them.

factions.name: Dream Warriors
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Play lots of small minions which can recur themselves and grow stronger the more of them you play.

factions.name: Druids
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Harness the power of the sun and earth in Energy and burying, controlling your territory and surprising your foes.

factions.name: Duelists
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Activate your minions' abilities with repeated Swordplay actions and +1 power counters.

factions.name: Dystopian Regime
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Conquer bases through swarm change of control and removing +1 power counters for abilities.

factions.name: Eggs
factions.author: GreySherpa
factions.description: Use self destruction to convert your minion power into heaps of +1 power counters. Sacrifice it all to summon the devastating Omelette.

factions.name: Electric Elementals
factions.author: nanpaCrown
factions.description: Electric Elementals lay down cards to charge and explode on a subsequent turn.

factions.name: Empire, The
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Utilize your two Death Stars to spread your forces across the board for global domination, then quickly collapse your power onto unsuspecting bases.

factions.name: Emu Army
factions.author: Sibeskia Faithful
factions.description: Dodge destruction, spread out, and attack players with more power.

factions.name: Encanto
factions.author: Geek13579
factions.description: Cancel the abilities on any player's cards and look through opponents' cards to make informed decisions about upcoming plays.

factions.name: Enchanters
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Bring opponents' minions under your spell and weaken their minds with Marks.

factions.name: Energy Beings
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Increase power to burst bases and gain momentum from power increases.

factions.name: Engineers
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Increase numbers on your cards, making them more effective.

factions.name: Family Recipes
factions.author: SirErrant
factions.description: Dinner's ready! Pair up with family dishes from across the world, using Stasis to cook up homemade recipes and swarm your enemies' taste buds—with love.

factions.name: Fantasy Heroes
factions.author: phantomic109
factions.description: Get added power boosts when your minions increase in power in this Hello World! faction.

factions.name: Farm Fighters
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Play and transfer actions between your minions. Gain momentum the more you move.

factions.name: Fast Food
factions.author: Sonus
factions.description: Cares about different printed powers on your own minions.  Utilizes play on minion actions as well as a the 'condiment' keyword.  Extra minion plays and draw.

factions.name: Fellowship of the Kiwi
factions.author: Sibeskia Faithful
factions.description: Use your cute minions, sad eyes, and incredible ability to survive, to sweep in and save your Smash Up from the dark forces.

factions.name: FernGully
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Build an elaborate ecosystem of cards which use power counters to defend their bases against incursions.

factions.name: Film Noir
factions.author: SirErrant
factions.description: Flirt with danger by destroying your own minions, triggering powerful abilities like extra plays and movement.

factions.name: Final Fantasy V
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Equip your minions with actions that grant versatile abilities and become even stronger when paired with one of the Warriors of Light (or Gilgamesh).

factions.name: Final Fantasy IX
factions.author: WisdomEnvy
factions.description: Share resources amongst your minions to power up unique talents.

factions.name: Final Fantasy Tactics: Jobs
factions.author: Sonus
factions.description: They have 12 unique minions with various synergies to discover among them. Find the right Job for the task.

factions.name: Fine Dining
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Access your rare cards and incentivize other players to play where you want them to, gaining advantages when you maintain the lead.

factions.name: Fishermen
factions.author: eisbread
factions.description: Lure opponents onto bases with tempting rewards, then reel them in at the last minute and ensnare them.

factions.name: Five Nights at Freddy's
factions.author: Just Lazer DGE
factions.description: Build up Fright counters

factions.name: Footballers
factions.author: phantomic109, 10037
factions.description: Move your Titan from base to base to increase your chance of being able to activate its Talent.

factions.name: Fortune Tellers
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Do you dare seek knowledge your future, even if the price is your sanity? Delay your Madness into the future with stasis counters until the time is right, then leverage it for extra plays, power counters, and card draw.

factions.name: Fours Users
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Choose your own destiny as you unlock powers through following the light or dark side.

factions.name: Gacha Gamers
factions.author: Lime17
factions.description: Play with an extra deck containing powerful cards and weaker cards, using your main deck to gamble on which ones you get and tip the odds in your favor.

factions.name: Geomancers
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Bury opponents' minions and reap benefits when they are uncovered.

factions.name: Gladiators
factions.author: Geek13579
factions.description: Duel honorably and capture opposing minions upon their defeat to bolster your ranks.

factions.name: Goblin Mercenaries
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Trade cards with other players and use manipulative Goblin tactics to gain advantages with your transactions.

factions.name: The Godfather
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Call upon your associates and hold your opponents' cards hostage.

factions.name: Godseekers
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Steal other players' minions using a network of stored cards.

factions.name: Golden Sun
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Play your Djinn for useful abilities, then combine them in your discard pile to unleash powerful Summon actions from your extra deck.

factions.name: Golfers
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Prepare a big chain of terminal plays.

factions.name: Gorgons
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Fill bases with buried cards, then shatter them to release the power trapped inside.

factions.name: Graboids
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Keep your opponents on edge with cards that attack from being buried, move buried cards and gain benefits from buried cards.

factions.name: Grampires
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Go in and out of stasis, powering up and attacking bases; repeat on-play abilities through placing played cards back in stasis.

factions.name: Gravity Falls
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Draw and share Madness cards with other players while trying to end the game with just enough Madness in your discard pile.

factions.name: Grillers
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Time your bursts to match when your cards have built up enough equity.

factions.name: The Grimm Troupe
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Stall the game to complete a multi-step Ritual.

factions.name: Hackers
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Siphon opponents’ power and use it for your own purposes to cascade as many bases as possible into breaking at once with this Hello World! faction.

factions.name: Hades
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Play twelve powerful modifiers and empower Hades' lone minion.

factions.name: Hibernators
factions.author: eisbread
factions.description: Accumulate cards in your hand for winter, gain benefits for maintaining a large hand size, and play extra minions come spring.

factions.name: Highlanders
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Store card under cards and activate abilities. Preserve singularly powerful minions.

factions.name: Ice Golems
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Freeze the board and snowball to victory.

factions.name: Iconoclasts
factions.author: Onassi, ludichrisness
factions.description: Bring new Colossus mini-bases into play and score them to win rewards while the rest of the world crumbles.

factions.name: Iditarod
factions.author: Sibeskia Faithful
factions.description: Set up checkpoints, move your minions around to build up Energy, and lead your sled team to victory.

factions.name: Illusionists
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Lead with low power footprints and always keep your best cards available.

factions.name: Inception
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Get inside your rival's head and play powerful but situational cards with great timing while you plan an elaborate operation to dive into a recursive turn.

factions.name: Jack O'Lanterns
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Play with a day/night cycle, where your cards are more passive and defensive during the day and more aggressive at night.

factions.name: Japanese Poets
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description:
One and one factions,
Sprout a deck as buds in spring.
Paul Peterson's dream.

factions.name: Jazz Singers
factions.author: SirErrant
factions.description: Improvise on the spot with these Special singers by playing versatile standard actions and manipulating ORs to jazz up your plays.

factions.name: Jedi Order
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Use your Lightsabers to stock up on future counters and plan your victory turns in advance.

factions.name: Jellyfish
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Spread out on multiple bases and build Marks on your minions to apply negative effects to others.

factions.name: Jocks
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Swarm Bench Warmers, stomp out troublesome bases, and assert dominance on your turn.

factions.name: Jungle Islander Cavalry
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Enjoy a feel reminiscent-yet-distinct style from a combination of Bear Cavalry, Polynesian Voyagers, and Killer Plants in these mini-factions.

factions.name: Jurassic Park
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Race for survival against the terrifying T-Rex, using all manner of tricks and traps to take advantage of movement and titans.

factions.name: Kamar-Taj
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Play minions from stasis to bounce them in and out of the Mirror Dimension.

factions.name: Kart Racers
factions.author: GammaMania
factions.description: Race your minions around the bases in a linear direction, and gain power and other benefits for moving minions.

factions.name: King Kong
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Use play on base actions to crush bases.  Gain benefits from destruction and return to hand.

factions.name: Kobolds
factions.author: GammaMania
factions.description: Play extra low-power minions on bases where you control high-power minions.

factions.name: The Legend of Zelda (bae_gel)
factions.author: bae_gel
factions.description: Unlock the power of OR abilities by giving them new effects!

factions.name: The Legend of Zelda (phantomic109)
factions.author: phantomic109
factions.description: Adjust your minions' power using +1 and -1 power counters to trigger conditional abilities.

factions.name: LEGO
factions.author: Bandit
factions.description: Piece common cards together to create big plays.

factions.name: Liches
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Use discarded minions as fuel for a horde of the undead.

factions.name: Living Dead
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Bury multiple minions from the discard pile. Infect other players' minions that you bury and then eventually uncover under your control.

factions.name: Lobotomy Corporation
factions.author: Just Lazer DGE
factions.description: Manage abnormalities.

factions.name: Loopers
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Repeatedly play minions and activate their abilities, or find the right combination of cards for an infinite VP combo.

factions.name: Lumas
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Grow threatening in-play specials the longer they remain in play, coupled with a powerful movement package.

factions.name: Lunatics
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Bring your killer titan in and out of play, raising its power by destroying minions.

factions.name: MacGyver
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Assemble objects (minions) together to unlock benefits and abilities.

factions.name: Mad Chemists
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Build your own deck and mix your cards to obtain a variety of effects.

factions.name: Mafia
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Pay off opponents for benefits, charge players for using your turf, and place hits on troublesome minions to silence them.

factions.name: Mantis Tribe
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Win bases on opponents' turns.

factions.name: Mariachi
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Build a musical engine by playing cards with abilities that all players can use.

factions.name: Mega Man
factions.author: nanpaCrown
factions.description: Mix the granted abilities of actions to create a super fighting robot.

factions.name: Metroid
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Blast through your deck with upgraded Beam attacks, discovering secrets hidden within.

factions.name: Middle Earth: Mordor
factions.author: Sibeskia Faithful
factions.description: One ring to rule them all, one ring to find them, one ring to bring them all, and in the darkness bind them in the Land of Mordor where shadows lie.

factions.name: Mind Flayers
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Win duels to take control of other players' minions and infect them with Madness, or destroy their minds with Illithid Tadpoles to grow your ranks.

factions.name: Minstrels
factions.author: GammaMania
factions.description: Play Song actions on your minions, which affect everyone at their base, and use those songs to take control of other players' minions.

factions.name: Misfits
factions.author: Multiple authors
factions.description: An All Stars-style collection of cards that were deemed “misfits” in their original faction but gain new life in another context.

factions.name: Monopoly
factions.author: Ludum
factions.description: It's money time! Build houses and hotels, charge +1 power counters rent to other players, and use all your wealth to boost your minions.

factions.name: Moonlighters
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Search for powerful minions, switch them out, and choose one of two unique abilities for the minion's job.

factions.name: Monster Hunters
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Lay enticing traps for other player's minions and cash out when you destroy them.

factions.name: Mortal Kombat
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Perform fatalities in the form of your minions' special abilities to overtake opponents as a base scores.

factions.name: Mountain Dwarves
factions.author: Sonus
factions.description: Dwarves may move slowly, but they are strong. Use abilities that buff you on your next turn.

factions.name: Mountaineers
factions.author: ludichrisness, normieleon
factions.description: Start your climb with small minions, then jump off them for big plays to try to break bases. Quickly recover from failures to try again.

factions.name: Musical Theatre
factions.author: SirErrant
factions.description: Join this ensemble cast as they use Energy to put on Special performances before/after a base scores.

factions.name: Naga
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Bury minions defensively and swarm chain uncover minions to break bases.

factions.name: Nanobugs
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Build an unstoppable army of robotic insects to swarm bases and get rid of other players’ cards.

factions.name: Naruto
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Use your extra deck for more utility when you play main characters and swarm the base with shadow clones.

factions.name: Narwhals
factions.author: Onassi, Berryl
factions.description: Play no standard actions when setting up, then chain all of them together at once.

factions.name: Necrodancers
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Zombify your minions into Undead monsters, then harness the power of the Undead to swing bases.

factions.name: Necrons
factions.author: Ludum
factions.description: Put your minions in stasis for benefits, swarm bases and plan power bursts to break them.

factions.name: Night Elves
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Sneak on to bases at the last minute with Night Elf Trickery and grow power with your nurture of natural forces.

factions.name: Nobles
factions.author: SirErrant
factions.description: Crush the Filthy Peasants under your heel while exploiting the power you gain from being outnumbered on a base.

factions.name: Noble Dogs
factions.author: Colinus Haggardus
factions.description: Alter the lines of authority with these commanding canines and take control of other players' minions to march your way to victory.

factions.name: Occult Investigators
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Flirt with Madness with this Hello World! faction as you quickly draw through your deck, stashing cards inside the Madness deck to be played at the perfect moment.

factions.name: Olympians
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Push your minions to their limit by increasing both their power and other players' minions, as well as increase the breakpoint, and then compete.

factions.name: Oozes
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Trap your rivals in ooze as you slowly but inexorably dissolve their cards.

factions.name: Oracles
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Grow stronger the more information you reveal to opponents, and unlock your cards' potential by presenting them.

factions.name: Orcish Horde
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Stomp through bases brutishly with the orcish horde by destroying, protecting, and sneaking as you see fit.

factions.name: Ori
factions.author: Bandit
factions.description: Substitute action plays for useful effects while you prepare powerful extended Skill chains.

factions.name: Outer Ones
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Draw benefits from from Madness cards, share them with other players, and accumulate them to summon the incomprehensible Azathoth.

factions.name: Over The Garden Wall
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Force all players to draw Madness cards to trigger powerful abilities and manipulate your Madness from the discard pile.

factions.name: Painters
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Play with a unique cast of six artists who use Energy to copy the attributes of other cards.

factions.name: Paladins (Onassi)
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Enforce righteousness by drafting two of five subdecks to fill out the rest of your deck.

factions.name: Paladins (Sonus)
factions.author: Sonus
factions.description: Play helpful actions on your minions that offer protection, power, and generate +1 power counters.

factions.name: Pale Court
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Keep players off your chosen bases for solo scores.

factions.name: Pandas
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Passively grow over time, block opponents' avenues of play, and gain advantages for having large minions.

factions.name: Pastry Chefs
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Draw actions from your deck and prepare future abilities while you bake devastating yet delicious Cakes over multiple turns.

factions.name: Petrichor V
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Aliens have crash landed on your planet, threatening the creatures that call this place home. Choose from five mini-factions at the start of the game to create the perfect deck, then remove them from your sanctuary with the ancient Artifact abilities.

factions.name: Phantom Thieves
factions.author: SirErrant
factions.description: Steal the hearts of corrupt individuals with these 10 ordinary high schoolers, each of whom swap into their linked Personas to become masked heroes of justice.

factions.name: Phoenixes
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Put your minions through the cycle of life, perpetually destroying them and bringing them back from the ashes.

factions.name: Physicists
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Manipulate +1 power counters to activate the abilities of these seasonally scary scientists. Trick-or-treat!

factions.name: Pizza Delivery
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Order pizzas for later and have everything ready to smash for when they arrive.

factions.name: Plague Doctors
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Weaken other players' minions with Corrosion, then strike when those minions are at their weakest.

factions.name: Plumber Sisters
factions.author: Grey Sherpa
factions.description: Use powerful play-on-minion actions and movement to hit hard and stay on the board.

factions.name: Pokémon
factions.author: Lime17
factions.description: Use ten unique minions to weaken bases, position yourself for later turns, and burst when the time is right with power gain and extra plays.

factions.name: Pop Stars
factions.author: SirErrant
factions.description: Take center stage with this Hello World! faction, which uses searching to turn temporary power into new minions with powerful abilities.

factions.name: Popeye
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Feed the board with your cards until it's time for a Spinach rush.

factions.name: Predators
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Use Marks to designate opponents worthy of destruction, capture minions, and use them for a future power boost.

factions.name: Preppers
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Accumulate power and resources inside a safe Bunker and burst out to break bases.

factions.name: Primate Defense League
factions.author: Colinus Haggardus
factions.description: Play and upgrade powerful minions. Send balloons to your opponents to hinder them, or pop them to gain special bonuses.

factions.name: Psychics
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Play minions with higher than average power but negative abilities, and cancel those abilities to unlock new ones.

factions.name: Pyromaniacs
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Set fire to bases and whittle away at their breakpoint or explode them.  Gain breakpoint reductions as you burn and blow things up.

factions.name: Quantum Physicists
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Move your minions wherever you want and keep your turn flexible with OR abilities.

factions.name: Ranger's Apprentice: The Main Characters
factions.author: Sibeskia Faithful
factions.description: Hide minions, draw cards, gain extra actions, and strike from the shadows. Your opponents won't know what hit them.

factions.name: Rangers
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Track your foes and take them down when it matters most.

factions.name: Rappers
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Play actions off the top of your deck in rap-battling duels.

factions.name: Rebel Alliance (Berryl)
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Surprise your foes by chaining lots of special abilities all at once.

factions.name: Rebel Alliance (LordMewtwo73)
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Unlock the full potential of your cards' abilities when other players have more VP than you.

factions.name: Rebels
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Place +1 power counters on opposing minions and then take advantage of them once powered up.

factions.name: Redwallers
factions.author: phantomic109, 10037
factions.description: Defend bases from other players' cards and score by yourself.

factions.name: Rival Tech
factions.author: Normieleon
factions.description: Manipulate your hand size and set up your prospecting operations to guarantee access to your best cards through brutal corporate efficiency.

factions.name: Rogues
factions.author: SirErrant
factions.description: Take advantage of your expertise in thievery to manipulate and gain benefits from stored cards. Watch out for their Sneak Attack!

factions.name: Safari
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Gain benefits from movement.

factions.name: Saiyans
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Gain power to break bases through placing and moving +1 power counters on/from actions and minions.

factions.name: Sasquatches
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Swarm elusive minions from a shadowy forest that disappear and reappear without a trace.

factions.name: Scavengers
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: A Hello World! faction revolving around trashing cards in your hand and boosting power during other player's turns.

factions.name: Selkies
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Waste rival minions on low value bases you intend to lose, while controlling the high value bases in play.

factions.name: Separatists
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Overwhelm your foes with an army of easy-to-play droid minions that can also be destroyed for extra card draw.

factions.name: Shadows
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Play from behind, then surge in power when you take the lead.

factions.name: Shiranui
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Use your minions that are in play or in the discard pile as cost to play minions from your extra deck as extra minions.

factions.name: Shonen Fighters
factions.author: Blim Blonker, AndIQuote
factions.description: Train hard, engage in climactic duels with your opponents, and even recruit their minions to your side after defeating them.

factions.name: The Simpsons (Colinus)
factions.author: Colinus Haggardus
factions.description: Play minions of wacky, crazy power, grow more powerful as more Simpsons come into play, and leave your opponents saying "D'oh!"

factions.name: The Simpsons (Lonan)
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Prank others with specials and use as little effort as possible to win bases.

factions.name: Simulators
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Manipulate reality by playing Programs that alter the abilities of bases.

factions.name: Sketchy Housing
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Add and remove counters to and from cards, especially Energy, and house some of your minions as base modifiers.

factions.name: Slashers
factions.author: Chuckyscookie
factions.description: Destroy your own minions for benefits and whittle the survivors down to The Final Girl.

factions.name: Slimes
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Slowly gain potential energy by splitting and merging your minions.

factions.name: Smash (Up) Mouth
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Hey now, here's some All Stars! Like the official Smash Up All Stars and World Champs, this faction showcases fan favorites from Smash Up history.

factions.name: Snackmancers
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Lure an opponent with Snacks and make them choose between fattening up their minions or allowing you to reap the rewards instead.

factions.name: Snipers
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Place counters on other bases and snipe them or other players' minoins from afar.

factions.name: Soda
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Surge in potential when bases are fresh on the board.

factions.name: Soul Sanctum
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Wield powerful engines that can fail catastrophically if not maintained.

factions.name: Soul Train
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Imbue your minions with the soul of the cards you discard. Play your lower-powered minions from outside your hand.

factions.name: Soup
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Toss ingredients from your hand, deck, and discard pile into a bubbling pot of soup to produce delicious results with stored cards.

factions.name: Spacegirl Squad
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Power up your minions and gain benefits from it. Setup and execute a big burst play.

factions.name: Space Commandos
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Reduce the breakpoint of a base from afar, and score by closing in on it.

factions.name: Space Realm
factions.author: Sonus
factions.description: Play on the most recently played base for extra benefits. Lower breakpoints and play extra bases.

factions.name: Sphinxes
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Become a master of riddles by forcing your opponents to make hard choices and corner them into no-win situations. Llet your opponent be the cause of their own unmaking.

factions.name: Spicy Entrées
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Place and manipulate negative power counters (-1 power counters).  Gain benefits from negative power counters.

factions.name: Squirrel
factions.author: Cat&dungeons1
factions.description: Create copy of Squirrel to sacrifice them to win! Offers a new way to play!

factions.name: Stardust Crusaders
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Use big minions with linked actions to cause massive damage before bases score.

factions.name: Stegos
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Is Armor Stego your favorite minion in Smash Up? Well look no further, because this faction will fulfill all of your wildest CAM dreams!

factions.name: Stephen Troopers
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Get name-based benefits by deploying and powering up your minions, who are all named Stephen.

factions.name: Stickmen
factions.author: Colinus Haggardus
factions.description: Use the power of the imagination to bring ideas to life and jump back quickly from rejected ideas.

factions.name: Storm Orcs
factions.author: Sonus
factions.description: Chain multiple small instances of gaining power in a turn among multiple minions.

factions.name: Storytellers
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Create a Story-based engine that your minions can interpret however they like.

factions.name: Straw Hats
factions.author: phantomic109, Captain Cardboard
factions.description: Move your minions around and gain advantages by scoring more bases.

factions.name: Streets of Fire
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Carefully build up your resources by trading action plays for other benefits before unleashing precise, powerful attacks on bases.

factions.name: Summoners
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Summon minions and titans from other factions not being played this game.

factions.name: Sun Gods
factions.author: SirErrant
factions.description: Harness the radiant Energy of the Sun Gods, biding your time with stasis counters before bursting forth with glorious power.

factions.name: Super Anime Swordfighters
factions.author: SirErrant
factions.description: Play with a roster of Super Smash Bros. fighters armed with special Blades who specialize in seeing and changing the future.

factions.name: Super Mario Bros.
factions.author: bae gel
factions.description: One-up the competition with an assortment of useful power-ups, and gain benefits for having characters with modifiers on them.

factions.name: Suppervillains
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Take advantage of other players' rare minions to advance your Schemes.

factions.name: Survivors (RoR1)
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Team up with your fellow survivors and utilize various equipment and weapons to keep yourself alive. Choose from five different mini-factions to change up your deck in each game.

factions.name: The Sword in the Stone (AndIQuote)
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Use your wits and knowledge to plan ahead, driving strategies and opportunities around the cards on top of your deck.

factions.name: The Sword in the Stone (Crossfire7)
factions.author: Crossfire7
factions.description: Draw and play Sword actions, increase the power of characters, and benefit from controlling characters of power 5 or more.

factions.name: Symbiotes
factions.author: LordMewtwo73
factions.description: Attach the symbiote to your minions to give them enhanced and increasing power, at the cost of their eventual demise. Transform into special symbiote minions from the Linked deck to unleash their true potential.

factions.name: Tacolytes
factions.author: CaptainCosmic and ludichrisness
factions.description: Add new flavors to your Madness cards and devour them to rush the bases before things gets too crazy.

factions.name: Tattooists
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Search your deck for an action and place it on a minion - even if it's not a minion modifier.

factions.name: Tau
factions.author: Sonus
factions.description: Use Drones (these are PoBs) to support your minions.  Benefits for spreading your cards out to then converge later.  Slow down bases while building up, and use their Drones to protect against solos.

factions.name: Team Z
factions.author: Lime17
factions.description: Either use risky maneuvers to score bases with just one minion for great rewards, or stack minions on a base to build and burst power safely. Use movement and your titan to help you achieve both.

factions.name: Team Fortress 2
factions.author: GammaMania
factions.description: Use a cast of ten unique mercenaries to complete objectives on base modifiers for VP.

factions.name: Ten Little Soldier Boys
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: Play with a cast of ten unique minions and trigger powerful effects as the number of minions in the discard pile grows.

factions.name: Terminators
factions.author: Crossfire7
factions.description: Terminators from the future seek to destroy their targets, especially before bases score, and persist after going to the discard pile in the form of horrifying Endoskeletons.

factions.name: Three Houses
factions.author: SirErrant
factions.description: Lead students into battle, granting powerful relic weapons to the right users to strengthen their abilities.

factions.name: Thrifters
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Give your cards a second-hand use when they are in your discard pile.

factions.name: Ticket to Ride
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Spread Train cars out and hold their tickets in hand to go on as long a train ride as possible.

factions.name: Time Realm
factions.author: Sonus
factions.description: Skip plays on a future turn to strengthen the current turn.

factions.name: Tom Bombadil
factions.author: CaptainCosmic and ludichrisness
factions.description: Play with a reduced cast of merry fellows and their collection of Rhymes that let you drastically change what your cards do.

factions.name: Trebuchets
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Load your cards on your cards to release them in a massive turn of extra plays.

factions.name: TrollHunters
factions.author: Colinus Haggardus
factions.description: Duel your opponents and assert your dominance on bases.

factions.name: Trolls
factions.author: nanpaCrown
factions.description: Use the dancestor’s deaths to bring in beta trolls which care about rare minion quantity

factions.name: Tuckskin Rikers
factions.author: Snakevin
factions.description: Force your opponents to bury cards for you to either destroy or take for yourself.

factions.name: Twilight Struggle
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Control the tempo of the game by dictating how your rivals are allowed to play while you prepare for the possibility of nuclear war.

factions.name: Tyranids
factions.author: Ludum
factions.description: Spread your minions among bases, gather your troops to break them and steal the victory at the last minute.

factions.name: Undead Scourge
factions.author: Lonan
factions.description: Skeletonize and control minions when destroying them or by summoning them from any player's discard pile. Swarm bases with your army of the dead.

factions.name: Unseelies
factions.author: Ludichrisness
factions.description: Sling your stronger minions for their abilities while sneaking past traps which punish all players.

factions.name: Urban Architects
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Manipulate breakpoints to take advantage of your cards' abilities. Gain momentum from breakpoint changes.

factions.name: Vessels
factions.author: Berryl
factions.description: Keep equity on your minions all game long.

factions.name: Vs. Spiders
factions.author: Georg
factions.description: Spread Webs and ensnare opposing minions while infesting the field with lots of small spider minions.

factions.name: Wakanda
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Combine the forces of two different Tribes and upgrade cards with Vibranium to force your rivals out of your home territory.

factions.name: Warmages
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Launch powerful actions into the air to burn down bases and to eliminate rivals before the base scores.

factions.name: Water Realm
factions.author: Sonus
factions.description: Draw cards, gain power and plays from drawing cards, and wash away bases and weak minions.  Can also protect you from bases and abilities!

factions.name: Weirdos
factions.author: WisdomEnvy
factions.description: Play minions with threatening specials. Swing bases before scoring, or trigger your abilities early to score on your own.

factions.name: Whales
factions.author: Gecko
factions.description: Move minions around to activate abilities that retrieve cards or add power. Set off a chain of movement by Migrating.

factions.name: Wingspan
factions.author: Onassi
factions.description: Build an engine by nesting your minions on bases and play additional minions there. Make use of the Bonus Card side deck.

factions.name: Witches
factions.author: ludichrisness
factions.description: Cast Hexes and power them up with different kinds of counters and cards to benefit you or hurt others.

factions.name: Wolverine Corps.
factions.author: Colinus Haggardus
factions.description: Gain a permanent foothold with the most ruthless animal military unit and storm your way to victory.

factions.name: World Archery
factions.author: Sibeskia Faithful
factions.description: Build up your power with training and cards, then when the moment is right, take your shot and win.

factions.name: Wretched Pigmen
factions.author: CaptainCosmic
factions.description: Arrange your deck and swarm the board with swine.

factions.name: X-Nauts
factions.author: AndIQuote
factions.description: A Hello World! faction with an emphasis on converting excess power into breakpoint damage and additional VP.
